client_optimization_status.highlight: Besu: All 3 optimizations live on bal-devnet-2 (parallel exec, state root, prefetch)
Reth: Parallel exec and state root in progress; batch I/O delayed
Nethermind: Parallel exec in progress; state root partially implemented; batch I/O not started
Geth: 3 performance presets implemented via flags; block building issue being resolved

devnet_and_testing.highlight: bal-devnet-2 stable; Besu and Geth ready for benchmarking
Benchmarking framework needs BAL-specific tests targeting parallel exec, state root, prefetch
ETH/71 (DevP2P BAL retrieval) required for reorg scenarios; must test with sync
EELS can now fill Amsterdam benchmark tests; BAL-specific benchmarks in progress

early_block_rejection.highlight: Static cap: BAL items limited by gas_limit/2000; prevents malicious builder DOS
Dynamic check: track untouched items vs remaining gas to reject invalid blocks early
Must exclude system contract accesses from dynamic check to avoid false positives

json_rpc_updates.highlight: JSON RPC methods implemented in Besu, Nethermind, Geth for devnet-2
Devnet-3: return BAL as JSON object (not RLP bytes); naming debate ongoing
eth_simulateV1 should be implemented in devnet-3 for benchmarking support

networking.highlight: ETH/71 spec adds getBAL method; separate from block bodies for cleaner implementation
ETH/71 must support partial BAL responses (>10MB) like ETH/70 receipts

action_items.action: Merge DevP2P ETH/71 spec and create corresponding EIP for BAL retrieval
Update specs: static BAL item cap and dynamic rejection check (exclude system contracts)
Finalize JSON RPC naming convention (byBlockHash vs byHash) in execution-apis PR #726

decisions.decision: Static consensus rule: max BAL items = block_gas_limit / 2000
Dynamic check filters system contract accesses to prevent false positive rejections
Devnet-3 scope: BAL optimizations + EIP-8037 state creation + EIP-7954 max contract size

targets.target: Devnet-3: BAL as JSON objects, corrected RPC naming, eth_simulateV1 support
